dark_jacket: The subject is wearing a dark, textured, high-collared jacket with subtle metallic accents
techwear: The subject is wearing an oversized black techwear hoodie with multiple tactical straps, buckles, and a high-tech waterproof fabric texture. A heavy metallic chain is around the neck
puffer_jacket: The subject is wearing a vibrant, oversized electric blue puffer jacket layered over a minimalist white graphic t-shirt
neon_bomber: The subject is wearing a sleek, translucent neon-trimmed bomber jacket with glowing fiber-optic patterns and a futuristic high collar. The look is clean, sharp, and avant-garde
blazer_trousers: The subject is wearing a {outfit_color} structured pantsuit with double-breasted blazer and wide-leg trousers
suit_shirt: {outfit_color} tailored suit, white dress shirt, no tie
